item.description:
Who's in the mood for laughter?!?!

There's a festival of sketch comedy, stand-up and improv coming to Lowell this weekend. The sketch comedy at Old Court Pub sounds like a good event for our meetup group. Check the 8:00 listing for Friday the 28th.

If anyone is unfamiliar with downtown Lowell and wants to meet somewhere first, mention it in your RSVP. Otherwise, look for Chet at the event.

More information at the following web site:
http://www.lowellcome...


This Year?s Festival Will Showcase Some of The Nation?s Top Comedy Troupes from Chicago, Boston, San Francisco, LA, New York and all over the world

More than one hundred improvisers, stand-up comedians, and sketch artists will descend upon the City of Lowell on September 28th and 29th to perform in the 2007 Lowell Comedy Festival. Performances will take place at the Lowell Memorial Auditorium, Middlesex Community College Theatre, The Old Court Pub, and the Brewery Exchange.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Lowell Comedy Festival
